items.name: I-44 Salamander
items.description: The signature orange pauldron allows easy battlefield detection of the bearer, alive or dead, on ash-strewn battlefields.

items.name: I-92 Fire Fighter
items.description: The heavy rubber tunic and reflective limb guards, originally designed to save citizens from burning buildings, now enable the liberal application of the cleansing fires of Justice.

passive.name: Inflammable
passive.description: Provides 75% damage resistance to fire, allowing bearer to rest assured in the inflammability.
